org.corfudb.infrastructure.log

Interface StreamLog

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StreamLogWithRankedAddressSpace
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryStreamLog, StreamLogFiles

    public interface StreamLog
    An interface definition that specifies an api to interact with a StreamLog.

    Created by maithem on 7/15/16.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void append(List<LogData> entries)
      Append a range of consecutive entries ordered by their addresses.
      void append(long address, LogData entry)
      Append an entry to the stream log.
      void close()
      Close the stream log.
      void compact()
      Remove all trimmed addresses from the StreamLog.
      default OverwriteCause getOverwriteCauseForAddress(long address, LogData entry)
      Get overwrite cause for a given address.
      TailsResponse getTails()
      Get the global tail and stream tails.
      long getTrimMark()
      Get the first untrimmed address in the address space.
      void prefixTrim(long address)
      Prefix trim the global log.
      LogData read(long address)
      Given an address, read the corresponding stream entry.
      void release(long address, LogData entry)
      unmap/release the memory for entry.
      void reset()
      Clears all data and resets all segment handlers.
      void sync(boolean force)
      Sync the stream log file to secondary storage.

    • Method Detail

      • append

        void append(long address,
            LogData entry)
        Append an entry to the stream log.
        Parameters:
        address - address of append entry
        entry - entry to append to the log

      • append

        void append(List<LogData> entries)
        Append a range of consecutive entries ordered by their addresses. Entries that are trimmed, or overwrites other addresses are ignored (i.e. they are not written) and an OverwriteException is not thrown.
        Parameters:
        entries -

      • read

        LogData read(long address)
        Given an address, read the corresponding stream entry.
        Parameters:
        address - address to read from the log
        Returns:
        Stream entry if it exists, otherwise return null

      • prefixTrim

        void prefixTrim(long address)
        Prefix trim the global log.
        Parameters:
        address - address to trim the log up to

      • compact

        void compact()
        Remove all trimmed addresses from the StreamLog.

      • getTails

        TailsResponse getTails()
        Get the global tail and stream tails.

      • getTrimMark

        long getTrimMark()
        Get the first untrimmed address in the address space.

      • sync

        void sync(boolean force)
   throws IOException
        Sync the stream log file to secondary storage.
        Parameters:
        force - force data to secondary storage if true
        Throws:
        IOException

      • close

        void close()
        Close the stream log.

      • release

        void release(long address,
             LogData entry)
        unmap/release the memory for entry.
        Parameters:
        address - address to release

      • reset

        void reset()
        Clears all data and resets all segment handlers.

      • getOverwriteCauseForAddress

        default OverwriteCause getOverwriteCauseForAddress(long address,
                                                   LogData entry)
        Get overwrite cause for a given address.
        Parameters:
        address - global log address
        entry - entry which would cause the overwrite
        Returns:
        (OverwriteCause) Cause of the overwrite
